Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection and perfectly aligns with your needs. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $110 for you to consider. This offer takes into account both the value you place on the product and my aim to ensure a fair transaction. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
